CustomField.description: Sum of commission + Fees (Program and FS Fee)
CustomField.formula: IF( AND(Surplus_Lines_Policy__c =TRUE, RecordType.DeveloperName = "Scale"), (MGA_Commission__c + Policy_Fee__c + Wholesale_Fee__c ),(Commission_New__c + FS_Fees__c + Program_Fee__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sum of Commission + Fees (Program and FS Fee)
CustomField.label: Total Revenue
